Summary: Slow moving solid red light, no navigational lights
divs: sighting detailsobserved solid red light moving across sky at slow speed. no navigational lights as i have seen, living near military bases all my life. was very unusual.was at work taking a smoke break. observed a solid reddish light moving east toward panama city, fla. light was very unusual based on my experiences. i think i just observed my first ufo. solid red light\ orb continuous path west to east slow moving low flight path <500 ft object moved out of view after approximately 3 min appeared to be moving through cloud cover viewed object behind outback steak house in destin fl 34908 emerald coast pkwy destin, fl 32541 one additional witness
